oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Woman holding two banners
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rowe, Amy; Rowe, Martin
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Phototgraphers' description: photos and video of Jan 29-Feb 11, 2011, Protests (downtown) & celebration in Maadi. Text in image: STOP HYPOCRICY WE WANT DEMOCRACY, كنا نطالب بالرحيل الأن نطالب بالمحاكمة. Translation of Text in image: We demand departure now, we demand a trial.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Demonstrations; Egypt; Protest movements; Revolutions
Protest Posters; Women
